TPML Core Reference Manual

The TPML Core package provides a framework to implement an application used to teach the theory of programming.

Language Implementations
de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.l0  
de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.l1  
de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.l2  
de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.l3  
de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages.l4  

 

The TPML Core package provides a framework to implement an application used to teach the theory of programming.

This includes classes for big and small step interpreters, as well as classes for a type checker, using different languages.
